bug.author: juaxix
bug.summary: Foliage culling uses the wrong distance in Low Mode
bug.description: There is a problem with foliage culling using quality mode set to Low. When you are close to parts of the foliage seems like it uses a different origin of the foliage mesh. This is because the instanced foliage actor is using max culling instead of the foliage culling system. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/996806/39583617-c682ced2-4ef0-11e8-9fb4-cccb5f803437.gif></denchmark-link>
